title: FontLab survey and prizes
content: FontLab is surveying users of their software (and competitors), and offering some nice prizes for responses, and even just tweeting about it. [http://blog.fontlab.com/fontlab/fontlab-survey-win-prizes/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414044202/http:/blog.fontlab.com/fontlab/fontlab-survey-win-prizes/ "http://blog.fontlab.com/fontlab/fontlab-survey-win-prizes/")
author: Thomas Phinney

comments.content: What is this actually for? Secretly I'm hoping the results of this survey will be utilized for a new version of FontLab. Is a new version due soon?
Certainly that's part of it. We don't have anything to announce yet, though. It is a little way off.
